alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued May 15 at 11:59AM EDT until May 16 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding. * WHERE...All of the Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest threat of minor saltwater flooding in the lower and middle Florida Keys will extend through mid afternoon today, with additional potential early this week. Minor coastal flooding is expected to be more continuous through the upper Florida Keys.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
